8EDD2CF6421D4528925D3A00686BFB4E.description: Skills and Techniques: demonstrate appropriate art skills, craftsmanship skills, and knowledge in the creation of artwork.

55DAD3B96DB74A7C80E9D5B6FF748FBA.description: Creating and Connecting: generate, develop, and refine artistic ideas/work that can relate to personal experiences, society, cultural, or historical context.Â

54D50B435FB04EF684DA5857C1CCA8A4.description: Ask and answer questions to help determine or clarify the meaning of words and phrases in a text.

15C84AC3933045CA961B2771BF5C9617.description: Identify words and phrases in stories or poems that suggest feelings or appeal to the senses.

8DD1FCD5BBAF45D3944BC8CD3D5D77B1.description: Use words and phrases acquired through conversations, reading and being read to, and responding to texts, including using frequently occurring conjunctions to signal simple relationships (e.g., because).

AB60B4E9513D4ADDBC2D4174D66F7448.description: Identify real-life connections between words and their use (e.g., note places at home that are cozy).

662DE973465E4847B39A84FC88554C9D.description: Define words by category and by one or more key attributes (e.g., a duck is a bird that swims; a tiger is a large cat with stripes).

60AF62207A5C48B485E043D29CD707D5.description: Sort words into categories (e.g., colors, clothing) to gain a sense of the concepts the categories represent.

9C0CFDC3062047B9BC5608FB05447F5E.description: Identify frequently occurring base words (e.g., look) and their inflectional forms (e.g., looks, looked, looking).

75B5E0761DE345E98C4B505219E70692.description: Use frequently occurring affixes as a clue to the meaning of a word.

5AA163E6C3E04BF3B5347F0CC9E2FA7B.description: Use sentence-level context as a clue to the meaning of an unknown word or multiple meaning word/phrase. (e.g., light).
